name: The Helmet of Destiny
description:
Fixed and updated version of our Ludum Dare game jam is also available to choose as a download!

-Added score during game

-Able to unlock locked game modes

-Enemies spawn in more areas than three

Stranded on an unknown space station you are faced with an endless wave of alien enemies. Armed with only the suit of armor on your back and a prototype helmet on your head you are face to face with the horde. Stranded, alone, and with communications jammed your only task is to take out as many of these SOB's before they rip you to shreds. I'm Frank Shatter and I approve this message.

W,A,S,D to move

Left mouse to shoot

Yellow power up is shield

Blue power up is rapid fire

We hope you all enjoy the game as much as we have enjoyed creating it!
